page.title: 12Communications
page.content: Transport is very popular in the Sale area, especially cars and buses. We went round our school to see how many people had bikes; the total was about 97%. We also asked about cars; the total was about 93%. We asked about motorbikes; the toatl was about 6%. The next question was about what sort of transport they use to come to school: 39% walked, 60% came by car, 1% by bike. Then we asked the teachers -none walk, eight use cars, two by byke. Then we did a survey of our class on types of car. Five people had Cavaliers, four had Sierras, two had Chevettes, and two had Carltons. Most people, when travelling by bus are going shopping or to work.
